english.segment1: There's a secret I must tell. Of all the love I've found. And it's hidden in my heart. The day you tore my world apart
english.segment2: Hallelujah, King forever, friend and Saviour
english.segment3: Jesus' blood never fails me, Jesus' blood never fails me, Jesus' blood, Jesus' blood
english.segment4: And this secret, it will run. To the corners of the earth. Where every woman, every son. Will carry high their chains undone
english.segment5: Hallelujah, King forever, friend and Saviour
english.segment6: Jesus' blood never fails me, Jesus' blood never fails me, Jesus' blood never fails me, Jesus' blood, Jesus' blood
english.segment7: Sing your songs of freedom. Praise the God of heaven. Love that never fails me. Jesus' blood, Jesus' blood
